comment: Really challenging example of adapting a graph with many nodes to a very narrow space. The print version uses a circular diagram, the web version allows columns side-by-side for child nodes at the same level and the mobile version stacks them all vertically.
Interesting interview about this piece here: http://www.snd.org/2014/05/infographic-case-study-boston-globes-energetic-interactive-and-print-graphics/
